002javac -cp ".;junit-4.12.jar" PrintTest.java
003
004java -cp ".;hamcrest-core-1.3.jar;junit-4.12.jar" \
005     org.junit.runner.JUnitCore \
006     PrintTest

008
009import static org.junit.Assert.*;
010import org.junit.Test;
011import org.junit.Ignore;
012import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
013import org.junit.runners.JUnit4;
014
015/**
016 * Testing the RandomFruit class
017 * 
018 * @author  Pavithra Subramaniyam;  pavithra.subramaniyam@tuni.fi;              
019 *                        
020 */
021
022public class RandomFruitTest {
023    /**
024    * Simple number test 
025    * <p> AssertEquals method has been used                      
026    */
027    @Test
028    public void NumberTest(){
029        var number = new RandomFruit();
030        assertEquals(Double.valueOf(0),Double.valueOf(number.GetRandom(1)) );
031    }
032
033    /**
034    * This is to check the given range
035    * <p> AssertTrue method has been used                      
036    */
037    @Test
038    public void RangerTest(){
039        var number = new RandomFruit();
040        assertTrue(number.NumberRange(3));
041    }
042
043}
